## FieldDropdown.trimOptions() method

Factor out common words in statically defined options. Create prefix and/or suffix labels.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected trimOptions(options: MenuOption[]): {
        options: MenuOption[];
        prefix?: string;
        suffix?: string;
    };
```
